ConfigureDtsJob.title: ConfigureDtsJob
ConfigureDtsJob.summary: Configures a data migration or synchronization task.

ConfigureMigrationJobAlert.title: ConfigureMigrationJobAlert
ConfigureMigrationJobAlert.summary: Configures alert settings to monitor a data migration instance.

ConfigureSubscriptionInstance.title: ConfigureSubscriptionInstance
ConfigureSubscriptionInstance.summary: Configures a change tracking instance of the previous version.

ConfigureSubscriptionInstanceAlert.title: ConfigureSubscriptionInstanceAlert
ConfigureSubscriptionInstanceAlert.summary: Configures alert settings to monitor a change tracking instance.

ConfigureSynchronizationJobAlert.title: ConfigureSynchronizationJobAlert
ConfigureSynchronizationJobAlert.summary: Configures alert settings to monitor a data synchronization instance.

ConfigureSynchronizationJobReplicatorCom.title: ConfigureSynchronizationJobReplicatorCompare
ConfigureSynchronizationJobReplicatorCom.summary: Enables or disables image matching for a data synchronization instance.

ConvertInstanceResourceGroup.title: ConvertInstanceResourceGroup
ConvertInstanceResourceGroup.summary: Transfers resource groups of instance resources.

CreateConsumerChannel.title: CreateConsumerChannel
CreateConsumerChannel.summary: Creates a consumer group for a change tracking task. Downstream clients can use the consumer group to consume tracked data.

CreateConsumerGroup.title: CreateConsumerGroup
CreateConsumerGroup.summary: Creates a consumer group for a change tracking instance.

CreateDtsInstance.title: CreateDtsInstance
CreateDtsInstance.summary: Purchases a Data Transmission Service (DTS) instance.

CreateJobMonitorRule.title: CreateJobMonitorRule
CreateJobMonitorRule.summary: Creates or modifies an alert rule for a Data Transmission Service (DTS) task.

CreateReverseDtsJob.title: CreateReverseDtsJob
CreateReverseDtsJob.summary: Creates a reverse task for a data synchronization or migration task.

DeleteDtsJob.title: DeleteDtsJob
DeleteDtsJob.summary: Deletes a data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking task.

DeleteDtsJobs.title: DeleteDtsJobs
DeleteDtsJobs.summary: Deletes multiple data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking tasks.

DescribeCheckJobs.title: DescribeCheckJobs
DescribeCheckJobs.summary: Verifies data migration tasks and data synchronization tasks

DescribeClusterOperateLogs.title: DescribeClusterOperateLogs
DescribeClusterOperateLogs.summary: Queries operation logs of a Data Transmission Service (DTS) dedicated cluster.

DescribeClusterUsedUtilization.title: DescribeClusterUsedUtilization
DescribeClusterUsedUtilization.summary: Queries the resource usage of a cluster.

DescribeConnectionStatus.title: DescribeConnectionStatus
DescribeConnectionStatus.summary: Queries the connectivity of Data Transmission Service (DTS) servers to the source and destination databases.

DescribeConsumerChannel.title: DescribeConsumerChannel
DescribeConsumerChannel.summary: Queries the information of a consumer group, including the consumer group ID, consumer group name, username, and message latency.

DescribeConsumerGroup.title: DescribeConsumerGroup
DescribeConsumerGroup.summary: Queries the details of consumer groups in a change tracking instance.

DescribeDTSIP.title: DescribeDTSIP
DescribeDTSIP.summary: Queries the CIDR blocks of DTS servers.

DescribeDataCheckReportUrl.title: DescribeDataCheckReportUrl
DescribeDataCheckReportUrl.summary: Queries the download URL of the data consistency verification report.

DescribeDataCheckTableDetails.title: DescribeDataCheckTableDetails
DescribeDataCheckTableDetails.summary: Queries the details of a data verification task.

DescribeDataCheckTableDiffDetails.title: DescribeDataCheckTableDiffDetails
DescribeDataCheckTableDiffDetails.summary: Queries the information about inconsistent data in the data verification task.

DescribeDedicatedCluster.title: DescribeDedicatedCluster
DescribeDedicatedCluster.summary: Queries the information about a dedicated cluster.

DescribeDedicatedClusterMonitorRule.title: DescribeDedicatedClusterMonitorRule
DescribeDedicatedClusterMonitorRule.summary: Queries the information about an alert rule.

DescribeDocParserJobResult.title: DescribeDocParserJobResult
DescribeDocParserJobResult.summary: Retrieves the result of a document parsing task.

DescribeDocParserJobStatus.title: DescribeDocParserJobStatus
DescribeDocParserJobStatus.summary: Queries the execution status of a document parsing task.

DescribeDtsEtlJobVersionInfo.title: DescribeDtsEtlJobVersionInfo
DescribeDtsEtlJobVersionInfo.summary: Queries the details of extract, transform, and load (ETL) tasks.

DescribeDtsJobDetail.title: DescribeDtsJobDetail
DescribeDtsJobDetail.summary: The latency of incremental data migration or synchronization. \\\\\\\\> If you query data migration tasks, the unit of this parameter is milliseconds. If you query data synchronization tasks, the unit of this parameter is seconds.

DescribeDtsJobs.title: DescribeDtsJobs
DescribeDtsJobs.summary: Queries the list of Data Transmission Service (DTS) tasks and the details of each task.

DescribeDtsServiceLog.title: DescribeDtsServiceLog
DescribeDtsServiceLog.summary: Queries the logs of a data migration or synchronization task.

DescribeEndpointSwitchStatus.title: DescribeEndpointSwitchStatus
DescribeEndpointSwitchStatus.summary: Queries the status of the task that changes the database connection settings.

DescribeEtlJobLogs.title: DescribeEtlJobLogs
DescribeEtlJobLogs.summary: Queries the logs of extract, transform, and load (ETL) tasks.

DescribeInitializationStatus.title: DescribeInitializationStatus
DescribeInitializationStatus.summary: Queries the details of initial data synchronization, including the information about the schemas and historical data of the object to be synchronized.

DescribeJobMonitorRule.title: DescribeJobMonitorRule
DescribeJobMonitorRule.summary: Queries the monitoring rules of a Data Transmission Service (DTS) task.

DescribeMetricList.title: DescribeMetricList
DescribeMetricList.summary: Queries the metrics of a cluster.

DescribeMigrationJobAlert.title: DescribeMigrationJobAlert
DescribeMigrationJobAlert.summary: Queries the alert settings of a data migration instance.

DescribeMigrationJobDetail.title: DescribeMigrationJobDetail
DescribeMigrationJobDetail.summary: Queries the details of a data migration task.

DescribeMigrationJobStatus.title: DescribeMigrationJobStatus
DescribeMigrationJobStatus.summary: Queries the status of a data migration task.

DescribeMigrationJobs.title: DescribeMigrationJobs
DescribeMigrationJobs.summary: Queries the list of data migration instances and the details of each instance.

DescribePreCheckCreateGadOrderResult.title: DescribePreCheckCreateGadOrderResult
DescribePreCheckCreateGadOrderResult.summary: Queries the result of a precheck task before a GAD instance is created.

DescribePreCheckStatus.title: DescribePreCheckStatus
DescribePreCheckStatus.summary: Queries the status of a Data Transmission Service (DTS) subtask that performs precheck, schema migration, initial schema synchronization, full data migration, initial full data synchronization, incremental data migration, or incremental data synchronization.

DescribeSubscriptionInstanceAlert.title: DescribeSubscriptionInstanceAlert
DescribeSubscriptionInstanceAlert.summary: Queries the alert settings of a change tracking instance.

DescribeSubscriptionInstanceStatus.title: DescribeSubscriptionInstanceStatus
DescribeSubscriptionInstanceStatus.summary: Queries the status of a change tracking instance.

DescribeSubscriptionInstances.title: DescribeSubscriptionInstances
DescribeSubscriptionInstances.summary: Queries the list of change tracking instances and the details of each instance.

DescribeSubscriptionMeta.title: DescribeSubscriptionMeta
DescribeSubscriptionMeta.summary: Queries the details of the subtasks in a distributed change tracking task for a PolarDB-X 1.0 instance.

DescribeSynchronizationJobAlert.title: DescribeSynchronizationJobAlert
DescribeSynchronizationJobAlert.summary: Queries the alert settings of a data synchronization instance.

DescribeSynchronizationJobReplicatorComp.title: DescribeSynchronizationJobReplicatorCompare
DescribeSynchronizationJobReplicatorComp.summary: Queries whether image matching is enabled for a data synchronization instance.

DescribeSynchronizationJobStatus.title: DescribeSynchronizationJobStatus
DescribeSynchronizationJobStatus.summary: Queries the status of a data synchronization instance.

DescribeSynchronizationJobStatusList.title: DescribeSynchronizationJobStatusList
DescribeSynchronizationJobStatusList.summary: Queries the status of one or more data synchronization instances.

DescribeSynchronizationJobs.title: DescribeSynchronizationJobs
DescribeSynchronizationJobs.summary: Queries the list of data synchronization instances and the details of each instance.

DescribeSynchronizationObjectModifyStatu.title: DescribeSynchronizationObjectModifyStatus
DescribeSynchronizationObjectModifyStatu.summary: Queries the status of the task that changes the objects to be synchronized.

DescribeTagKeys.title: DescribeTagKeys
DescribeTagKeys.summary: Queries all the tags added to a data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking instance.

DescribeTagValues.title: DescribeTagValues
DescribeTagValues.summary: Queries all the tag values of a tag bound to a data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking instance.

InitDtsRdsInstance.title: InitDtsRdsInstance
InitDtsRdsInstance.summary: Initializes a built-in account on a node of an active geo-redundancy database cluster. Data Transmission Service (DTS) uses the built-in account to connect to the node and perform data synchronization tasks.

ListDedicatedCluster.title: ListDedicatedCluster
ListDedicatedCluster.summary: Queries all clusters that are created within an Alibaba Cloud account. You can also query clusters based on the specified conditions.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are bound to specific data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking instances, or queries the instances to which specific tags are bound.

ModifyConsumerChannel.title: ModifyConsumerChannel
ModifyConsumerChannel.summary: Modifies the information of a consumer group, including the consumer group name, username, and password.

ModifyConsumerGroupPassword.title: ModifyConsumerGroupPassword
ModifyConsumerGroupPassword.summary: Modifies the password of a consumer group

ModifyConsumptionTimestamp.title: ModifyConsumptionTimestamp
ModifyConsumptionTimestamp.summary: Modifies the consumption checkpoint of a change tracking instance.

ModifyDedicatedCluster.title: ModifyDedicatedCluster
ModifyDedicatedCluster.summary: Modifies the configuration of a cluster.

ModifyDtsJob.title: ModifyDtsJob
ModifyDtsJob.summary: Modifies the configurations of a data synchronization task.

ModifyDtsJobConfig.title: ModifyDtsJobConfig
ModifyDtsJobConfig.summary: Modifies the parameters of a Data Transmission Service (DTS) task.

ModifyDtsJobDedicatedCluster.title: ModifyDtsJobDedicatedCluster
ModifyDtsJobDedicatedCluster.summary: Changes the dedicated cluster on which a Data Transmission Service (DTS) task runs.

ModifyDtsJobDuLimit.title: ModifyDtsJobDuLimit
ModifyDtsJobDuLimit.summary: Modifies the upper limit of DTS units (DUs) for a Data Transmission Service (DTS) task.

ModifyDtsJobEndpoint.title: ModifyDtsJobEndpoint
ModifyDtsJobEndpoint.summary: Changes the source or destination database instance of a data synchronization or migration task in Data Transmission Service (DTS).

ModifyDtsJobName.title: ModifyDtsJobName
ModifyDtsJobName.summary: Changes the name of a Data Transmission Service (DTS) task.

ModifyDtsJobPassword.title: ModifyDtsJobPassword
ModifyDtsJobPassword.summary: Changes the password of the account used to log on to the source or destination database in a Data Transmission Service (DTS) task.

ModifyDynamicConfig.title: ModifyDynamicConfig
ModifyDynamicConfig.summary: Enables throttling for data synchronization and data migration.

ModifyGadInstanceName.title: ModifyGadInstanceName
ModifyGadInstanceName.summary: Modifies the name of a GAD instance.

ModifySubscription.title: ModifySubscription
ModifySubscription.summary: Modifies the information about a change tracking task.

ModifySubscriptionObject.title: ModifySubscriptionObject
ModifySubscriptionObject.summary: Modifies the objects for change tracking.

ModifySynchronizationObject.title: ModifySynchronizationObject
ModifySynchronizationObject.summary: Modifies the objects to be synchronized.

PreCheckCreateGadOrder.title: PreCheckCreateGadOrder
PreCheckCreateGadOrder.summary: Prechecks before a GAD instance is created.

RenewInstance.title: RenewInstance
RenewInstance.summary: Renews a Data Transmission Service (DTS) instance. This API operation is available only for subscription instances.

ResetDtsJob.title: ResetDtsJob
ResetDtsJob.summary: Resets a data synchronization or change tracking task.

ResetSynchronizationJob.title: ResetSynchronizationJob
ResetSynchronizationJob.summary: Clears the configurations of a data synchronization task.

ShieldPrecheck.title: ShieldPrecheck
ShieldPrecheck.summary: Ignores the precheck items that a data migration or synchronization task may fail to pass.

SkipFullJobTable.title: SkipFullJobTable
SkipFullJobTable.summary: The tables that do not need to be synchronized in a full data synchronization are skipped.

SkipPreCheck.title: SkipPreCheck
SkipPreCheck.summary: Skips one or more precheck items.

StartDtsJob.title: StartDtsJob
StartDtsJob.summary: Starts a data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking task.

StartDtsJobs.title: StartDtsJobs
StartDtsJobs.summary: Starts multiple data migration or data synchronization tasks.

StartReverseWriter.title: StartReverseWriter
StartReverseWriter.summary: Starts the reverse task that is created by calling the CreateReverseDtsJob operation.

StopDtsJob.title: StopDtsJob
StopDtsJob.summary: Stops a data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking task.

StopDtsJobs.title: StopDtsJobs
StopDtsJobs.summary: Stops multiple data migration or data synchronization tasks.

StopMigrationJob.title: StopMigrationJob
StopMigrationJob.summary: Stops a data migration task that is in the Migrating state.

SummaryJobDetail.title: SummaryJobDetail
SummaryJobDetail.summary: Queries the number of migrated or synchronized objects in a Data Transmission Service (DTS) task.

SuspendDtsJob.title: SuspendDtsJob
SuspendDtsJob.summary: Pauses a data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking task.

SuspendDtsJobs.title: SuspendDtsJobs
SuspendDtsJobs.summary: Suspends multiple Data Transmission Service (DTS) tasks.

SwitchPhysicalDtsJobToCloud.title: SwitchPhysicalDtsJobToCloud
SwitchPhysicalDtsJobToCloud.summary: Migrates Microsoft SQL Server (MSSQL) to the cloud by using a physical gateway

SwitchSynchronizationEndpoint.title: SwitchSynchronizationEndpoint
SwitchSynchronizationEndpoint.summary: After you perform a primary/secondary switchover on the source or destination database, you can call the SwitchSynchronizationEndpoint operation to transfer the connection settings to Data Transmission Service (DTS). DTS will restart the data synchronization task from the breakpoint.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Adds tags to data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking instances.

TransferInstanceClass.title: TransferInstanceClass
TransferInstanceClass.summary: Upgrades or downgrades a Data Transmission Service (DTS) instance.

TransferPayType.title: TransferPayType
TransferPayType.summary: Changes the billing method of a Data Transmission Service (DTS) instance.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Unbinds tags from one or more data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking instances.

UpgradeTwoWay.title: UpgradeTwoWay
UpgradeTwoWay.summary: Upgrades the synchronization topology of a data synchronization instance from one-way synchronization to two-way synchronization. This operation is supported only for pay-as-you-go synchronization instances.

WhiteIpList.title: WhiteIpList
WhiteIpList.summary:
If the \\\\*\\\\*source or destination instance\\\\*\\\\* is a \\\\*\\\\*self-managed database\\\\*\\\\* or a \\\\*\\\\*third-party cloud database\\\\*\\\\*, you need to call this operation to query the CIDR blocks of DTS servers. Then, you need to add the CIDR blocks of DTS servers to the security settings of the source or destination instance, for example, the firewall of your database. For more information, see \\\\[Add the CIDR blocks of DTS servers to the security settings of on-premises databases]\\\(~~176627~~).

\\\>  If the \\\\*\\\\*source or destination database\\\\*\\\\* is an \\\\*\\\\*ApsaraDB database instance\\\\*\\\\* (such as RDS instance and ApsaraDB for MongoDB instance) or a \\\\*\\\\*self-managed database hosted on Elastic Compute Service (ECS)\\\\*\\\\*, you do not need to add the CIDR blocks. When you click \\\\*\\\\*Set Whitelist and Next\\\\*\\\\* in the DTS console, DTS automatically adds the CIDR blocks of DTS servers to the security settings of the source o
